Title: Letters from Iwo Jima
Writer: Iris Yamashita (screenplay), Iris Yamashita (story), Paul Haggis (story), Tadamichi Kuribayashi (book), Tsuyoko Yoshido (book)
Actors: Ken Watanabe, Kazunari Ninomiya, Tsuyoshi Ihara, Ry√¥ Kase
Plot: The story of the battle of Iwo Jima between the United States and Imperial Japan during World War II, as told from the perspective of the Japanese who fought it.
Production: Amblin Entertainment, Malpaso Company, Warner Bros., DreamWorks SKG
